data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Cercle Brugge get the game underway.
Damien Marcq for Zulte has been booked by Christof Dierick and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, Christof Dierick blows to end the first-half.
The second half is underway in Waregem - Zulte with the kick-off.
Dino Hotic is replacing Vitinho for Cercle Brugge at Regenboogstadion.
In the minute 65, At Regenboogstadion, Dimitar Velkovski has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Zulte's Daniel Opare has been booked in Waregem.
The away team have replaced Charles Vanhoutte with Calvin Dekuyper. This is the second substitution made today by Paul Clement.
In the minute 76, Jean-Luc Dompe is replacing Nikolaos Kenourgios for the home team.
Jean-Luc Dompe scores to make it 1-0 at Regenboogstadion.
Jean-Luc Dompe (Zulte) has received a yellow card from Christof Dierick.
Cercle Brugge have been given a penalty at Regenboogstadion...
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Zulte make their second substitution with Ewoud Pletinckx replacing Jelle Vossen.
Francky Dury (Zulte) is making a third substitution, with Abdoulaye Sissako replacing Omar Govea.
Jean Harrison Marcelin is booked for the away team.
